> emperical rule using sampling: 68, 95, 99.7 rule for normal distributions 

```{r}
random_norm = rnorm(1e5)

# 68
sum(random_norm < 1 & random_norm > -1)/100000

# 95
sum(random_norm < 2 & random_norm > -2)/100000

# 99.7
sum(random_norm < 3 & random_norm > -3)/100000

# 68
pnorm(1) - pnorm(-1)
```

> X ~ exp(4), P(X < 2)

```{r}
pexp(2, 4)

random_exp = rexp(1e5, 4)

sum(random_exp > -Inf & random_exp < 2)/100000
```
